DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Reduce #yAttack damage taken by #b25%. Reduce #yBlock gained by #b20%. Lose 1 stack when damage is taken.
Flipper Flaps are 0-cost Attack cards dealing 1 (2) damage to a random enemy 2 times, and gain 1 Flight. Exhaust.
Food items are a variety of 0-cost Skill cards that grant small bonuses. Ethereal. Exhaust. If Upgraded, counts as twice the amount of food eaten.
Reach certain milestones of Passivity to inflict debuffs. Milestones are reached at every 25% of the enemy's current HP. Once stacks reach 100% of the enemy's current HP, they flee.
Refers to playing a Food item.
Thunder is an Unplayable card such that whenever drawn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy and apply 1 Vulnerable.
Agent Rose's Bomb is a 10 (8) cost card that deals 100 damage to all enemies and gives 50 gold. Whenever drawn, its cost is reduced by 1.
Picky Eaters are 0-cost Skill cards that read "Choose one: Create 1 (Upgraded) Donut, Energy Drink, Fried Chicken, Hamburger, or Sushi, in your hand."
Your next Attack deals X extra damage.
